title: Three Families in Harmony!
content:
We thought people might be interested to see this specimen of three of Greater Albion's families working in harmony. Here we see a succesful favourite, [Bonning](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024003028/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/bonning/), the recent release [Bonnington](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024003028/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/bonnington/) and the imminent release BonaVia.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024003028im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Trumpers1_4644.png)
author: Rasendyll

comments.content: i would love to see this without the shades and the highlights, please it is so distracting and cheap looking
